articles.author: Rachael Levy
articles.title: Exclusive: Musk's Neuralink has faced issues with its tiny wires for years, sources say - Reuters
articles.description: Neuralink's disclosure last week that tiny wires inside the brain of its first patient had pulled out of position is an issue the Elon Musk company has known about for years, according to five people familiar with the matter.
